## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/memory">Memory</a> maps a file descriptor using <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/mapped-file-region">sys::fs::mapped&#95;file&#95;region</a>.

This handles converting the offset into a legal offset on the platform.

Definition at line 207 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/memorybuffer-cpp">MemoryBuffer.cpp</a>.
